title: Orgeat vintage French label
content:
Unable to find anything even close. Not sure what year this bottle label is but I’m guessing early 1900s. Any ideas appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Orgeat photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Orgeat%20photo.JPG) | 65.92 KB |
author: brianober

comments.content:
Probably hand drawn. If it’s the foliage ornamentation you like, you might dig [Egret](http://web.archive.org/web/20060207022731/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=DF.112069.0.2).

Similar Victorian types can be found in Monotype’s [Engravers](http://web.archive.org/web/20060207022731/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=engravers) sets.

Letterhead Fonts - Billhead - Some similarities  
Letterhead Fonts - Euphoria - Some similarities  
IHOF - Kilkenny - Some similarities
